title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 186-6.1 - General conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 186-6.1 - General conditions

State Regulations

No employer shall employ a child performer in any
activity that may be hazardous or detrimental to the physical or mental health, morals, education, or general welfare of the child performer. Infants under 15
days old may not be employed as child performers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
186-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
